thread.section_title: Tattoodo Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Tattoodo | tattoodo.com
thread.title: Sarah Maxwell

author: Sarah Maxwell
title: Sarah Maxwell
text: Pretty cool app, I get to see tons of my favorite artists work and create my own page. The only things I'm not liking are 3 things. I try to put my photos in my portfolio, it won't allow me and just puts them in uploads. Also, when I do upload a photo, it doesn't let me adjust the picture to size to fit the whole tattoo in the frame so I can't use certain pictures. And finally, idk how to allow my work flow through all the feeds to people will see my work.
